message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is worth $120 to you. I am willing to sell it to you for $110. This is my best offer for this round.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $110 is a bit steep for me.  I'm willing to pay $105. This is my best offer for this round.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a proposal. I am willing to sell the product to you for $108. This is my best offer for this round.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $108 is still a little too high for me.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $106.50. This is my final offer for this round.
I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement, Bob. After considering your last offer, I am willing to sell the product to you for $107. This is my final offer for this round.
